sentences.en: Because you are accepting others'help all the time, you should reciprocate them.
sentences.cn: 因为你是接受别人的帮助的时候, 你应该回报他们.

sentences.en: Don't feel the need reciprocate if your boss gives you something.
sentences.cn: 如果老板给你某样东西,不要感到有必要回送礼物.

sentences.en: I would like to reciprocate for your kindness.
I would like to think the way I treat people is reciprocated.
sentences.cn: 我愿意认为我对待别人的方式得到了同等的回应。

sentences.en: If I can reciprocate at any time, please let me know.
sentences.cn: 如果有要我效劳之事, 请告知.

sentences.en: Isn't the admiration and reciprocate to you with my heart?
sentences.cn: 不是对你用心的感叹与报答 吗 ?
日方似乎倾向于互惠互利.

sentences.en: Many thanks for your kind wishes for the New year which I heartily reciprocate.
sentences.cn: 新年承赐贺词,无任感谢,谨此复贺.
天秤座:本周天秤要报答别人为你提供的有用信息.

sentences.en: So long as he wishes to have relations with us, we are ready to reciprocate.
sentences.cn: 只要他自己愿意同我们来往, 我们还是准备和他来往.

sentences.en: Some day I will reciprocate your great kindness to me.
sentences.cn: 总有一天我会报答你对我的厚爱.

sentences.en: Some day I will reciprocate your kindness to me.
sentences.cn: 总有一天我会报答你对我的恩德.

sentences.en: This, in turn, would lead us and our partners to reciprocate a comprehensive and coordinated manner.
sentences.cn: 这反而会让我们和我们的朋友采取全方位的协调一致的行动.

sentences.en: We always invite the neighbors and they never reciprocate!
sentences.cn: 我们经常宴请邻居,可他们从来不报答我们.

sentences.en: When he spoke I was expected to reciprocate with some remark of my own.
sentences.cn: 他在说话时，我也应该说点什么回应他。

sentences.en: You are a great host; please allow me to reciprocate next time.
sentences.cn: 你真是个好主人, 请下次让我做东.

words.tran_cn: 往复运动（reciprocate的ing形式）；互给；报答

trans.tran_cn: 互给, 酬答, 互换, 报答
trans.tran_en: to do or give something, because something similar has been done or given to you

trans.tran_cn: 往复运动，互换，回报，互给
